creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: standing couple with toddler: man at L is holding the child, picnic basket by his feet; woman standing in front of man with small smile, clasping hands at waist, looking at toddler
marks:
Signature, Mark

in graphite on recto, bottom ri signed in graphite, bottom right: [Kathe Kollwitz]
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Greeting
